about_the_game:
My game is a turn-based RPG Maker game where the Saturn-worshipping Rich Ruling-Elite unleash military, hospital personnel, government agencies and hordes of Saturnalian Monsters onto the Earth for the purpose of eradicating the poor, huddled masses and it is up to you to survive this hilarious adventure?

Stop worrying, enjoy the "end of the world"!

HILTSWAETEOTW employs a survival-horror inspired turn-based combat system. Use your guns until your enemies display enough damage to cue you into switching over to melee weapons and take them down without using too much ammo. You'll need that ammo for the sick bosses that populate the world. Better yet? Avoid enemies and save as much as ammo as you can for bosses!

Have "angels" unlock your hidden human potentials. (Chakra System)

Enjoy a traumatic yet, hilarious story about the few poor people smart enough to take on the rich and their world dominating agenda. The humor is perfect for anyone who enjoys adult cartoons. Take on the evil Gil Bates and his secret society of inbred rich misfits to restore some semblance of peace in the world.

Foods and drugs affect the body in both positive and negative ways, explore which work best for you.

Save the kids from torture then turn them loose onto the world to make it better place! Hint: Save the kids!

Finish your path down the dreaded "Spirit Journey" in the "3d" realm so you don't have to reincarnate again. Meet God and have God smack you across the effing head! Enjoy multiple endings depending on your choices!

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content ahead! 

My game contains coarse language, adult humor, cartoon violence, drug use, badly drawn sexual references, references to children being tortured by rich ruling elitists, and enemy graphics that contain hidden sexual imagery. I mean, they're monsters from Saturn, of course of they are going to be sexual? Basically, Adult Only sexual content that actually is fairly rare throughout the story. It merely encompasses about 3% of the entirety of the game's content. Worst offenders? A notebook doodle porn scene that isn't even animated, (boss battle) and a final boss that is a demon made of smaller demons that are humping during transitions? Yeah, big deal, right? No, it really isn't. IF it weren't for SEX, you would NOT exist so, get over it.

detailed_description:
My game is a turn-based RPG Maker game where the Saturn-worshipping Rich Ruling-Elite unleash military, hospital personnel, government agencies and hordes of Saturnalian Monsters onto the Earth for the purpose of eradicating the poor, huddled masses and it is up to you to survive this hilarious adventure?

Stop worrying, enjoy the "end of the world"!

HILTSWAETEOTW employs a survival-horror inspired turn-based combat system. Use your guns until your enemies display enough damage to cue you into switching over to melee weapons and take them down without using too much ammo. You'll need that ammo for the sick bosses that populate the world. Better yet? Avoid enemies and save as much as ammo as you can for bosses!

Have "angels" unlock your hidden human potentials. (Chakra System)

Enjoy a traumatic yet, hilarious story about the few poor people smart enough to take on the rich and their world dominating agenda. The humor is perfect for anyone who enjoys adult cartoons. Take on the evil Gil Bates and his secret society of inbred rich misfits to restore some semblance of peace in the world.

Foods and drugs affect the body in both positive and negative ways, explore which work best for you.

Save the kids from torture then turn them loose onto the world to make it better place! Hint: Save the kids!

Finish your path down the dreaded "Spirit Journey" in the "3d" realm so you don't have to reincarnate again. Meet God and have God smack you across the effing head! Enjoy multiple endings depending on your choices!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/2000
  • Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 103 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: Turn-Based RPG set in post-Covid times where you take on an elite secret society that is depopulating the world using Saturnalian Monsters, Military, Hospital and Government personnel to conquer humanity. Satire/Parody/Comedy.
